From the brand

AOOG has always insisted on providing cost-effective car seat covers. Not only does it provide superior protection and meets versatile needs, it also adds comfort to your drive.Amazing details, clever design. Each AOOG seat cover has its own set of interior styles, details and premium materials. Discover the saddle that fits your vehicle.

Universal Leather Seat Covers

Universal Leather Seat Covers

Universal Leather Seat Covers

Universal Leather Seat Covers

F150 Leather Seat Covers

HIGH-QUALITY MATERIAL: High-Grade Leatherette materials Protect the original car seat from damage, Durable Wear-Resistant Waterproof Easy to Clean. Equipped with thick, premium High-Density Foam to create top resilience for maximum comfort during your drive.
PROTECTS & LUXURIOUS: These are the perfect seat covers for your car. Our seat covers offer protection against spills and stains that might occur inside of your vehicle. High-quality artificial leather and excellent appearance design, also refreshing the look of your interior.
STYLE DESIGN: Our universal fit seat covers with a unique visual design that is fully compatible with any built-in airbags. The anchor attached to the elastic strap can also provide firm reinforcement.
EASY TO INSTALL: For your convenience, installation instructions are included in the product package, and we also provide product installation videos. Just follow the installation instructions, it usually takes 10-20 minutes to complete the installation.
UNIVERSAL FIT: Our seat covers are designed to fit most vehicles, including cars, trucks, vans and SUVs. If you are not sure whether the vehicle is suitable for you, please contact us in time. Our customer service team will always online to assist you.

Read more

Details:
  • Protects your seats against spills and stains.
  • Lined with high-density foam for maximum comfort.
  • Quickly customize and refresh the look of your interior.
  • Sideless design compatible with side armrests and airbags.
  • Easy to Install within minutes.

AOOG Leather Car Seat Covers Set – Waterproof Universal Car Seat Protector

AOOG Car Seat Covers can protect the original seat, give your car seat a new look.

These are the perfect seat covers, the best investment for your new vehicle, We design our products to ensure comfort is our top priority.

  • High-quality leatherette to provide valuable protection and luxurious comfort for almost any car or truck.
  • The entire seat, backrest and headrest are lined with high-density foam to provide maximum comfort during long-distance travel and daily commuting.
  • What’s In The Package?
  • 2 pcs Front Seat Covers + 2 pcs Front Headrest Covers.
  • Adjustable Back Seat Covers (for full set only).
  • A Hardware Bag of Steel Hooks and Round Plates for Install.
  • An Installation Manual.

Read more

Airbag Compatible

The airbag has enough room to stretch and will never be blocked. The front seat back has pockets for the things you want to put.

High-Quality Material

AOOG Seat Covers are made of multiple layers of high-quality materials to provide maximum comfort during your driving.

Breathable Holes

The main part of AOOG Seat Covers has Breathable Holes to ensure breathability during use and increase your comfortable experience

Five Colors

We provide a variety of colors for your choice

Read more

  • Fit BMW: Series 1, Series 2, Series 3, Series 4, Series 5, Series 6, Series 7, Series 8, Mini Cooper, X1, X3, X4, X5, X6/Buick: Electra, Regal, Encore, LaCrosse, Enclave, Envision

  • Fit Nissan: Sentra, X-Trail, Altima, Maxima, Frontier, Pathfinder

item.content:encoded:
Price: $178.55
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:42:48 UTC – Details)



Camping Tent For Truck Bed: This tailgate tent makes it simple to stay dry and sleep comfortably off the ground inside your vehicle; Perfect for weekend warriors and seasoned professionals, this pickup truck tent turns any spot into a cozy campsite
Intuitive Features: The perfect tent for truck bed camping, our off-the-ground tent includes 2 gear pockets for small personal items, an overhead lantern hook, glow-in-the-dark zipper pulls, and a sky view vent
Quality Construction: Water-resistant outdoor tent features a floorless design, color-coded poles and pole pockets, tape-sealed seams, and protective heavy-duty straps and plastic buckles that won’t damage your vehicle’s finish
Sleeps 2: Must-have truck camping accessories, our floorless truck tents for camping sleep 2 adults; Tent, rainfly, and stuff sack with sewn-in setup guide are included
Simple Setup: All our truck bed tent’s attachment points are accessible from outside the truck bed, and set up is completed with your feet planted firmly on the ground – no step stool required

item.title: Lusso Gear Dog Car Seat Cover for Back Seat, Protects from Scratches, Scuffs, Shedding, Mud, & More, 100% Waterproof, Non-Slip Cover Stays Securely in Place, Fits Your Car, Truck, & SUV (Gray)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Defend Your Back Seat from Man’s Best Friend: Four layers of ultra-durable and waterproof Oxford fabric protects your car against scratches, scuffs, shedding, muddy paws, and puppy accidents!Fits All Cars, Trucks, & SUVs: The Lusso Gear cover fits all back bench seats and is extra-large for maximum coverage. Front and ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $49.95 - $35.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:28:48 UTC – Details)



Defend Your Back Seat from Man’s Best Friend: Four layers of ultra-durable and waterproof Oxford fabric protects your car against scratches, scuffs, shedding, muddy paws, and puppy accidents!
Fits All Cars, Trucks, & SUVs: The Lusso Gear cover fits all back bench seats and is extra-large for maximum coverage. Front and side flaps provide full coverage to protect your entire seat. No more fur and mud on your upholstery!
Won’t Slip, Sag, or Slide: Install and remove your cover in a flash with security anchors and an added security strap. A non-slip backing means your cover and your dog stay put without leaving a stain on leather seats.
Seatbelt and Latch Accessible: The Lusso Gear cover never restricts access to seatbelts or latch points. It’s the perfect protector for two and four-legged passengers! The extra-wide slots make it easy to install baby and child seats.
Satisfaction Guaranteed: Cleanup is quick and easy thanks to a machine-washable cover! Wipe with a damp cloth or toss it in the wash for a deeper clean. If you aren’t satisfied with your purchase, let us know and we’ll work with you until you are.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;

offlineStoreName.value = ”;

offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,

offlineYear,

);

Motor Trend Waterproof Car Seat Covers for Front Seats – Padded Neoprene with Two-Tone Stitching, Easy to Install Automotive Seat Covers, Universal Fit for Cars Trucks Vans and SUVs, Gray Stitching. Universal fit design for pick-up trucks, hatchback sedans and most other types of car, truck, van & SUV. Also works great as a baby, pet, or dog seat cover. Perfect car accessories for rideshare drivers too!
PROTECTS AGAINST STAINS – These are the perfect seat covers for your new car, or even a car that’s just new-to-you. Our front seat covers offer protection against spills and stains that might occur inside of your vehicle while also refreshing the look of your interior. Bucket seats dimensions-Back Height-2 feet. Width-1 feet 9 inch. Bottom Length(fr. the back)-1 feet 6 inch Width-1 feet 10 inch
WATERPROOF LINING – Have peace of mind knowing that your seats are protected in the case of an accidental spill. We use a waterproof neoprene foam lining on the inside of our seat protectors for maximum protection against spills.
MODERN DESIGN – Our universal fit seat covers feature a modern ‘side-less ‘design that is fully compatible with any built-in airbags and armrests found in newer vehicles. No modifications required, simply install and you’re all set
EASY TO INSTALL – The best investment for your new vehicle might also be the quickest. Follow our simple 3-step installation process to install the front seat covers before finishing off with the head rest covers.
UNIVERSAL FIT – Our front seat covers are designed to fit most vehicles including cars, trucks, vans and SUVs. Please see our product images for fitment examples. Some additional work may be required to create a ‘perfect’ fit.



Motor Trend SpillGuard Waterproof Car Seat Covers

Front Seats Only

These are the perfect seat covers for your new car, or even a car that’s just new-to-you. Our front seat covers offer protection against spills and stains that might occur inside of your vehicle while also refreshing the look of your interior.

Modern Design

Our universal fit seat covers feature a modern ‘side-less ‘design that is fully compatible with any built-in airbags and armrests found in newer vehicles. No modifications required, simply install and you’re all set!

Details

  • Protects your seats against spills and stains.
  • Breathable materials for maximum comfort during your commute.
  • Waterproof neoprene foam lining repels water and other liquids.
  • Universal Fit for Most Vehicles.
  • Easy to Install.

Refresh the Look of Your Interior

These are the perfect seat covers for your new car, or even a car that’s just new-to-you. Easily refresh the look of your interior in minutes.

Sideless Designs for Built-In Armrests

Our universal seat covers are fully compatible with side airbags and armrests. Universal fit for most vehicles including cars, trucks, vans and SUV. Please check dimensions before installation.

Waterproof Neoprene Lining

Have peace of mind knowing that your front seats are protected in the case of an accidental spill. Waterproof neoprene foam lines the inside of our covers to provide maximum protection.

item.title: 12V Car Battery Tester, TOPDON BT20 Battery Load Tester, Voltage Test Digital Alternator Tester, Cranking&Charging Test via App, Budget Automotive Battery Analyzer&Checker for Car Truck SUV ATV Boat
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the brand TOPDON, Your Ideal Car Helper TOPDON BT20 Battery Tester 2022 Budget Car Battery Tester Basic function: voltage and load test Extra function(with APP): Cranking and Charging Test TOPDON-Your Helper in Diagnose Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.62 x 5.67 x 3.27 inches; 12.35 Ounces Item model number ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $35.99 - $26.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:17:45 UTC – Details)

From the brand

TOPDON, Your Ideal Car Helper

TOPDON BT20 Battery Tester

2022 Budget Car Battery Tester

Basic function: voltage and load test

Extra function(with APP): Cranking and Charging Test

TOPDON-Your Helper in Diagnose

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.62 x 5.67 x 3.27 inches; 12.35 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ TOPDON BT20 Car Battery Tester
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 5, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ TT TOPDON
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0B5T7212M
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

【A Budget-Friendly Car Battery Tester】As a battery tester below 30 bucks, it features 4 testing modes: battery load tester (range 10V-20V), voltage test, cranking test, and charging test (alternator tester), the latter 2 test modes are availabe only with APP, offering you more value for the money. NOTE: For 12V lead-acid batteries. NOTE: It doesn’t measure CCA.
【Fast&Accurate Diagnosis within 1 Second】Simply click the TEST button, and get the testing results within 1 second. This battery tester will display the battery life by way of Low/Medium/High. Adopting the latest conductivity testing technology (up to 99.5% test accuracy). Thus, it makes a great choice for users who want to get results quickly. NOTE: It doesn’t measure CCA.
【Expanded Voltage, Cranking, and Charging Tests with APP】Easily connect to this car battery tester via Bluetooth to get additional cranking, charging, and voltage testing capabilities. Easily view real-time voltage waveform graphs with data playback functionality.
【Comprehensive Vehicle Coverage & Multi-Language Support】Plug & play operation. Simply connect the testing clamps to the battery and you are ready to analyze. This 12V battery tester works on a variety of vehicles with 12V Lead-acid batteries such as boats, motorcycles, ships, and trucks. Also this auto battery tester easily switches between 8 different languages.
【Ideal Car Tool for Every Car Owner】Reverse polarity and “no spark” protection for extra safety. Long 19.75″ clamp leads allow testing from inside or outside the vehicle. A perfect battery analyzer and load tester for small repair shops & car owners alike. Makes a great gift for car enthusiasts.
【8 HOUR TECH SUPPORT HOTLINE】TOPDON provides 2 Year Warranty for all products. In case of any inquiries, please feel free to contact us at 833-956-8335 Monday-Friday 9:00AM-6PM Eastern Time.

BT20 BATTERY LOAD TESTER

The BT20 is TOPDON’s entry-level wireless 12V battery tester. Offering load, voltage, charging, and cranking tests, the BT20 offers high-precision voltage detection and real-time voltage monitoring.

This easy-to-use device lets users of all skill-levels view voltage waveform graphs and test reports through an app. Test reports can be generated automatically, and easily share and save test reports. Data Playback function query battery voltage history data, help users analyze the problem by playing back charge and discharge data reports.

Its load test method provides accurate results, making the BT20 a battery tester with superb cost-effectiveness.

Quick access to test results in the app by linking your phone via Bluetooth.

Run Charging Tests: Test a battery’s charging performance with the app and analyze the results.

Run Cranking Tests: Test the battery through the load of the car itself, and view the results in the app.

Voltage Test:

Further analyze the battery’s health through its voltage, and predict the battery’s power status with the results of the BT20. Three kinds of indicator lights communicate the battery level, full, medium, and low.

Load Test:

Built-in load modules help determine the status of the battery.

Multi-Dimensional Display of Battery Status

No-load and load voltage readings can be displayed in the APP, and there is a real-time voltage waveform graph for accurate monitoring.

Battery Load Test

The BT20 applies load tests and monitors the voltage response of the battery. Users gain a clearer look at the actual remaining battery capacity.

Battery Voltage Test

Once the clamps are connected to the terminals, the BT20 delivers the battery voltage results in the blink of an eye.

Cranking Test

The cranking test measures the battery’s cranking voltage and cranking time when starting up. Normally, the cranking voltage should be above 9.6V. As for the cranking time, The shorter, the better!

Read more

Charging Test

The charging test measures the no-load voltage and load voltage, which helps you to understand the battery charging status, and alternator performance.

Supports 8 Languages to Maximize Utility

English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese

A Wide Range of Tests with Highly Accurate Results

The BT20 is designed for versatility. With a variety of testing capabilities, analysis tools, and a battery range of 5 to 20 volts, the tool delivers highly accurate result.

Read more

4.5
Price: $35.99 - $26.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:17:45 UTC – Details)

Product Description

APOLOGY:

THE COLOUR WE CALL “BLACK AND WHITE” IS ACTUALLY NOT THE CORRECT COLOUR WHICH WE MADE A MISTAKE WHILE BUILDING THE LISTS. AND AS THE COLOUR BLANK COULD NEVER BE ALTERED SINCE BEEN SUBMITED. SO WE MAKE THE APOLOGY HERE AND THE “WHITE” IN “BLACK AND WHITE” IS ACTUALLY “CREAM”.WE ARE REALLY SORRY FOR THE MISTAKE WE HAVE MADE AND PROMISE WE WOULD BE MORE CAUTIOUS IN THE JOB COMING UP.

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION:

Effective Protection: Use High-quality leatherette as the surface of Cushions, waterproof, wear-resistant and easy to clean, can be cleaned by wet towel. Fashion Looking: Upgrade your vehicle instantly with this fashion looking and Quickly customize and refresh the look of your interior.Easy to Install: We provide product installation videos. Just follow the installation instructions, it usually takes 10-20 minutes to complete the installation.

THE PACKAGE INCLUDING:FRONT ROW COVER*2PCS, REAR ROW COVER*2PCS, INSTALLATION INSTRUCTION*1PC, INSTALLATION FITTINGS*1 PACK

FAUX LEATHER UNIVERSAL CAR SEAT COVER

J010 BLACK AND CREAM

J010 PINK

J010 BLACK

DETAILS

THE BACK COVER OF THE FRONT SEAT IS FULLY WRAPPED AND PERFECTLY PROTECTED.

WE USE SOME SPECIAL MATERIALS IN THE SIDE COVER TO MAKE SURE THERE WOULD NO EFFECTS ON THE WORK OF THE AIRBAGS.

WE HAVE BUCKLES EXPOSED IN THE REAR SEAT AND THE EDGE OF THE BACK SEAT IS WELL WRAPPED AS WELL.

THE FAUX LEATHER IN THIS ITEM IS DURABLE AND EASY TO BE MAINTAINED IN DAILY LIFE.THERE IS A BACK POCKET IN EACH FRONT SEAT COVER WHICH IS SO CONVENIENT IN OUR CAR LIFE.

Fit
Universal Fit Universal Fit Custom Fit Custom Fit Custom Fit

Suitable for 99% cars, such as Sedans, Hatchbacks, SUV, Crossovers, Pickup Trucks, Crew Cab, Vans, Ev.
The Set includes front and back seats covers,seat heads covers,airbag and seat belt compatible
The PVC leather is quite wear-resistant and water-proof . If the covers get dirty, you can wipe it clean by wet towel easily.
It usually takes 10-25 minutes to complete the installation without the tool.
Makes your car more elegant and neat. Protect the original car seat.

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:06:40 UTC – Details)


The newest from Motor Trend: 3 layer waterproof car seat covers feature a soft polyester cloth outer layer with waterproof neoprene backing. Behind these layers is a patented non-slip backing which both reinforces and prevents tearing, while also keeping the cover in place and preventing slippage.
PROTECTS AGAINST STAINS – These are the perfect seat covers for your new car, or even a car that’s just new-to-you. Our front seat covers offer protection against spills and stains that might occur inside of your vehicle while also refreshing the look of your interior.
WATERPROOF LINING – Have peace of mind knowing that your seats are protected in the case of an accidental spill. We use a waterproof neoprene foam lining on the inside of our seat protectors for maximum protection against spills.
MODERN DESIGN – Our universal fit seat covers feature a modern ‘side-less ‘design that is fully compatible with any built-in airbags and armrests found in newer vehicles. No modifications required, simply install and you’re all set!
EASY TO INSTALL – The best investment for your new vehicle might also be the quickest. Follow our simple 3-step installation process to install the front seat covers before finishing off with the head rest covers.
UNIVERSAL FIT – Our front seat covers are designed to fit most vehicles including cars, trucks, vans and SUVs. Please see our product images for fitment examples. Some additional work may be required to create a ‘perfect’ fit.

Read more

Motor Trend AquaShield Car Seat Covers

Waterproof Neoprene Material with Modern Sideless Design

These are the perfect seat covers for your new car, or even a car that’s just new-to-you. They offer full seat protection against spills and stains that occur inside of your vehicle.

Specially selected for maximum comfort during your daily commute, we use a lightweight Poly blend outer material that offers a high level of ventilation.

Universal Fit

Our seat covers are designed to fit most vehicles including cars, trucks, vans and SUVs. Please see our product images for fitment examples. Some additional work may be required to create a ‘perfect’ fit.

Details

  • Protects your seats against spills and stains.
  • Waterproof neoprene foam repels all liquids.
  • Stylish two-tone design in multiple colors.
  • Compatible with side airbags and arm rests.
  • Easy to install within minutes.

Read more

Refresh the Look of Your Interior

These are the perfect seat covers for your new car, or even a car that’s just new-to-you. Easily refresh the look of your interior in minutes.

Sideless Designs for Built-In Armrests

Our universal seat covers are fully compatible with side airbags and armrests. Universal fit for most vehicles including cars, trucks, vans and SUV. Please check dimensions before installation.

Waterproof Neoprene Lining

Have peace of mind knowing that your front seats are protected in the case of an accidental spill. Waterproof neoprene foam lines the inside of our covers to provide maximum protection.

Read more

Made for Auto Enthusiasts

Motor Trend offers only high-quality premium products designed to protect and enhance your car or truck.

Read more

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:06:40 UTC – Details)

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:59:55 UTC – Details)

Product Description

High Quality: High quality material, soft and tough, durable.Waterproof and Heat Resistant: Can be used in any bad weather like rainy, sunny or snowy. Effectively block rainwater, reduce glare, and make driving vision clearer.Easy Installation: With double-sided tape, just peel off and stick on the rearview mirror that needs to be installed. After installation, it will not affect the folding of the rearview mirror, and will not leave traces and glue when torn off, and will not cause damage to the body.Perfect Decoration: Not only is it powerful, it can also decorate your car and look more stylish.

Contrast before and after the use of the rearview mirror rain cover:

1. The vision will be better in rainy days, don’t worry about the blurred vision caused by the raindrops on the rearview mirror.

2. The rear-view mirror rain cover can reduce the glare of the rear-view mirror under the sun, making your driving safer.

3. It can also be used as a car decoration at ordinary times to make your car more sporty.

Step 1

Clean the mirrors.

Step 2

Tear off the adhesive.

Step 3

Install to target location.

Step 4

The installation is complete.

【Material】: Our car rear view mirror rain eyebrow is made of soft PVC plastic that is 100% soft and flexible. It will not break or deform easily and can meet your needs for a long time.
【Size】: The size of this rear view guard eyebrow is about 7.28*2.17in, appropriate size will prevent rain from falling on the rearview mirror without blocking your view, full protection for your rearview mirror.
【Wide Application】: The side mirror rain guard can be widely applied in most kinds of cars and vehicles, like trucks, buses, tractors, SUVs, motorcycles and so on.
【Easy to Install】: The mixed adhesive is very sticky but does not leave marks, please pay attention to clean the rearview mirror before sticking and installing it when it is dry and dust free.
【Safe Driving】: Rain and heavy snow can blur the rearview mirror and thus interfere with your driving vision. Installing rain eyebrows can effectively block the interference of rain and snow, provide a clear vision and improve the safety of driving on rainy days.

  1. High Quality: High quality material, soft and tough, durable.
  2. Waterproof and Heat Resistant: Can be used in any bad weather like rainy, sunny or snowy. Effectively block rainwater, reduce glare, and make driving vision clearer.
  3. Easy Installation: With double-sided tape, just peel off and stick on the rearview mirror that needs to be installed. After installation, it will not affect the folding of the rearview mirror, and will not leave traces and glue when torn off, and will not cause damage to the body.
  4. Perfect Decoration: Not only is it powerful, it can also decorate your car and look more stylish.

Read more
